title: The Peaceful revolution
creator_credit: AEI Film Unit, Michael Clarke and Atma Ram
brief_description: Addresses the growth of electrical power in India and the parallel development of education and technology with their effect on heavy and light industries, methods of agriculture and upon living conditions in the villages and cities. International contributions to this peaceful revolution are underlined, and outstanding technological achievements seen include hydroelectric projects, the Durgapur steel plant, and the electrical engineering services at Bhopal.
